content:
FieldTemplateUserControl Class

Definition

Represents the base class for all field template controls.

In this Article

public class FieldTemplateUserControl : System.Web.UI.UserControl, System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplate, System.Web.UI.IBindableControl

Control

System.Web.UI.UserControl
FieldTemplateUserControl

Remarks

ASP.NET Dynamic Data field templates are ASP.NET user controls that map data controls to data types in a data model. Field templates derive from FieldTemplateUserControl, the class that enables access to data fields, data columns, and metadata in data models. Dynamic Data projects provide field templates by default. You can modify the field templates provided by default or create custom field templates.

This class inherits from the UserControl Class.

Constructors

FieldTemplateUserControl()

Initializes a new instance of the FieldTemplateUserControl class.

public FieldTemplateUserControl ();

Properties

ChildrenColumn

Gets the MetaChildrenColumn object associated with a field template.

public System.Web.DynamicData.MetaChildrenColumn ChildrenColumn { get; }
Value
MetaChildrenColumn

A column that represents a one-to-many relationship.

Exceptions
ArgumentNullException

ChildrenColumn is null.

Remarks

This property casts a MetaColumn to a MetaChildrenColumn. If the MetaColumn class is not a children column, this property throws an exception.

ChildrenPath

Gets the URL that links to a page that displays a list of children entities.

protected string ChildrenPath { get; }
Value
String

The URL that links the displayed page to the children entities.

Remarks

This method returns a URL that links to a page that displays a list of children entities. For example, the products column in the ProductCategories table in the AdventureWorksLT sample database has URLs that link to the list of product that are in the selected category. This property only applies to children columns.

Column

Gets the MetaColumn associated with a field template.

public System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn Column { get; }
Value
MetaColumn

An object that represents a database column.

ContainerType

Gets the type of the data-bound control that contains the FieldTemplateUserControl class.

public virtual System.Web.DynamicData.ContainerType ContainerType { get; }
Value
ContainerType

The container control type.

DataControl

Gets the data control that handles the data field in a field template.

public virtual System.Web.UI.Control DataControl { get; }
Value
Control

A data control that handles the data field in a field template.

FieldValue

Gets or sets the value of a column in a current row.

public virtual object FieldValue { get; set; }
Value
Object

An object that represents the value of the column in the current row.

FieldValueEditString

Gets the string representation of the value of a column in the current row when the row is in edit mode.

public virtual string FieldValueEditString { get; }
Value
String

The value of the column in the row that is edited.

Remarks

If formatting is enabled the string is formatted after editing.

FieldValueString

Gets the formatted string representation of the value of a column in the current row.

public virtual string FieldValueString { get; }
Value
String

The formatted value of the column in the current row.

ForeignKeyColumn

Gets the MetaForeignKeyColumn that is associated with a foreign key column.

public System.Web.DynamicData.MetaForeignKeyColumn ForeignKeyColumn { get; }
Value
MetaForeignKeyColumn

A column that represents a many-to-one relationship.

Exceptions
Exception

If the MetaForeignKeyColumn is not a foreign key column.

Remarks

This class converts the MetaColumn to a MetaForeignKeyColumn. The class throws an exception if MetaColumn is not a foreign key column.

ForeignKeyPath

Get the URL that links the current page to the page that displays the details of the foreign key entity.

protected string ForeignKeyPath { get; }
Value
String

The URL that links to the details of the foreign key data.

Remarks

If the data column has a many-to-one relationship, this property returns a URL that links to the page that displays the details of the foreign key entity. For example, in the Category column of the Product table in the Northwind Database, this method can return a link that goes to the details of the category that the product belongs to. This property applies to foreign key columns only.

FormattingOptions

Gets or sets the HTML encoding and formatting options to apply to a field template.

public System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions FormattingOptions { get; }
Value
IFieldFormattingOptions

The interface that exposes the HTML encoding and formatting options to apply to a field template.

Host

Gets or sets the host that provides context to this FieldTemplateUserControl class.

public System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplateHost Host { get; }
Value
IFieldTemplateHost

The object that provides context to this field template class.

MetadataAttributes

Gets the collection of metadata attributes that apply to the current column.

public System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection MetadataAttributes { get; }
Value
AttributeCollection

The collection of metadata attributes that apply to the column.

Mode

Gets the mode a field template uses.

public System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControlMode Mode { get; }
Value
DataBoundControlMode

The current mode of the field template.

Remarks

The DataBoundControlMode that field templates uses include Insert, Edit, and ReadOnly.

Row

Gets the current data row object.

public virtual object Row { get; }
Value
Object

The current data row object.

Remarks

The object returned by this the property and the GetDataItem method are equivalent. This property uses the Page.GetDataItem method to return the data row object.

Table

Gets the MetaTable that a column of a field template belongs to.

public System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable Table { get; }
Value
MetaTable

The table that the column that is associated with the field template belongs to.

Methods

BuildChildrenPath(String)

Gets the URL that links to the page that displays the list of children entities and allows the path to be overridden.

protected string BuildChildrenPath (string path);
path
String

The path to override.

Returns
String

The URL that links the displayed page to the children page.

Remarks

This method is similar to ChildrenPath, except that it allows the path part of the URL to be overridden. This method is used if the pages are not located in the DynamicData\CustomPages folder of the Dynamic Data project. This method applies to Children columns only.

BuildForeignKeyPath(String)

Get the URL that links the current page to the page that displays the details of the foreign key entity and allows the path to be overridden.

protected string BuildForeignKeyPath (string path);
path
String

The path to override.

Returns
String

The URL that links to the page that displays the details of the foreign key page.

Remarks

This method is similar to ForeignKeyPath except that it allows the path of the URL to be overridden. This property is used if the page is not located in the DynamicData\CustomPages folder your the Dynamic Data project.

ConvertEditedValue(String)

Gets either an input value or null based on stem.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn.ConvertEmptyStringToNull* and stem.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField.NullDisplayText*.

protected virtual object ConvertEditedValue (string value);
value
String

The input value.

Returns
Object

The converted value.

Remarks

This method returns ConvertEmptyStringToNull property and NullDisplayText property which can be set via metadata or the DynamicField class or DynamicControl.

ExtractForeignKey(IDictionary,String)

Saves the value of foreign keys.

protected virtual void ExtractForeignKey (System.Collections.IDictionary dictionary, string selectedValue);
dictionary
IDictionary

The dictionary that contains all the new values.

selectedValue
String

The value to save.

Remarks

This method is used when saving foreign key columns. The value of the foreign key is selected from the SelectedValue property of a drop down list.

ExtractValues(IOrderedDictionary)

Provides dictionary access to all data in the current row.

protected virtual void ExtractValues (System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary dictionary);
dictionary
IOrderedDictionary

The dictionary that contains all the new values.

Remarks

This method implements the ExtractValues method.

FindOtherFieldTemplate(String)

Determines the field template that is used to render a specified data column.

protected System.Web.DynamicData.FieldTemplateUserControl FindOtherFieldTemplate (string columnName);
columnName
String

The data column the field template renders.

Returns
FieldTemplateUserControl

The field template that is used to render a specified data column.

FormatFieldValue(Object)

Applies HTML encoding and formatting to a string that will be displayed.

public virtual string FormatFieldValue (object fieldValue);
fieldValue
Object

The value from the data field to format.

Returns
String

The formatted value.

GetColumnValue(MetaColumn)

Gets the value of a specified column in the current row.

protected virtual object GetColumnValue (System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn column);
column
MetaColumn

The column to get the value from.

Returns
Object

An object that represents the value of a specified column in the current row.

GetSelectedValueString()

Returns the string representation of the column's value.

protected string GetSelectedValueString ();
Returns
String

If the column's current value is a foreign-key column or an enumeration column, a string representation of the selected value; otherwise, null.

Remarks

The GetSelectedValueString method is used to return a string representation of foreign-key or enumeration column types.

IgnoreModelValidationAttribute(Type)

Allows a DynamicValidator to ignore a specific type of model validation attribute.

protected void IgnoreModelValidationAttribute (Type attributeType);
attributeType
Type

The attribute to ignore.

Remarks

This method allows a DynamicValidator to ignore a specific type of model Validation attributes. This method is called when the attribute type is already handled by an ASP.NET validation controls. Without this call, the validation can occur two times, resulting in a duplicate error message.

PopulateListControl(ListControl)

Populates a list control with all the values from a parent table.

protected void PopulateListControl (System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl listControl);
listControl
ListControl

The list control to populate.

Remarks

This method works with only foreign key columns.

SetUpValidator(BaseValidator)

Sets up a stem.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplateHost.ValidationGroup* on all validation controls.

protected virtual void SetUpValidator (System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator validator);
validator
BaseValidator

The validation control to set up.

Remarks

This method performs additional logic for specific validation control such as the RangeValidator and sets up a ValidationGroup on all validation controls.

SetUpValidator(BaseValidator,MetaColumn)

Sets up a DynamicValidator using the type of validator and the column to validate.

protected virtual void SetUpValidator (System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator validator, System.Web.DynamicData.MetaColumn column);
validator
BaseValidator

The type of validator to set up.

column
MetaColumn

The column for which to validator is set.

Remarks

This method used to set up ValidationGroup on all validators.

It performs additional logic for specific validator types in this method. For example, if range values exit in the data model this method sets up RangeValidator.

Explicit Interface Implementations

IFieldTemplate.SetHost(IFieldTemplateHost)

Associates a field template with the object that controls how the field template is used.

void IFieldTemplate.SetHost (System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldTemplateHost host);
host
IFieldTemplateHost

The object that hosts the field template class. Controls the use of the field template.

Remarks

This method implements the SetHost interface.

IBindableControl.ExtractValues(IOrderedDictionary)

Retrieves a set of name/value pairs to implement two-way data-binding in field template controls.

void IBindableControl.ExtractValues (System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary dictionary);
dictionary
IOrderedDictionary

The dictionary that contains name/values pairs.
